sentence.Network_en: Draskovic has emerged as the strongest challenger to the leader of the Serbian government.
sentence.Network_cn: 德拉什科维奇一跃成为塞尔维亚政府领导人最大的挑战者。

sentence.Network_en: Essential services were provided by Serbian workers bussed in from outside the province.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些基本的服务是由从外省乘坐大巴来的塞尔维亚工人提供的。

sentence.Network_en: And the same evening German motorized elements reached the Serbian frontiers.
sentence.Network_cn: 同日晚间,德国的摩托化部队进抵塞尔维亚边境.
